name: Prehistoric
description:
This is a small project I worked on for a month or so. It's a fun little idea that I personally enjoy with my friends. Feedback is really appreciated, so go ahead and comment away! The art is by the amazing Ark! Link to Ark's itch.io page here: https://arks.itch.io/ and a link to the art here: https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters

P.S. the art has been slightly modified for color reasons.

The music is by TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music and the link to the music page is here: 

That's all. Thanks for checking out this game! Every person counts.
